name: Sinking Simulator: Legacy
description:
The original Sinking Simulator from 2013 now on Steam!
For all fans of Sandbox focused on Chaos and Destruction!

Ever wanted to sink the Titanic? or perhaps Destroy the Eiffel Tower? What about flooding buildings?
All of this is possible through soft body physics interaction generated by your own PNG images.

Simply follow the color palette provided with the game and let your artistic side take over!
The materials are defined by a Json file which you can modify to add your own!
This legacy edition contain 4 versions of the game, all available through the Beta Tab.

This steam release is meant for those who are unable to run the most recent Sinking Simulator and wishes to have a similar albeit downscaled experience.
This is also meant as a way to help preserve the game to ensure it remains available for as long as possible.

While this version of the game is no longer in active development, the funds generated by the sales will help toward future projects
